results.t: How old is too old and how young is too young?
results.p: Determining what age is considered "too old" or "too young" can vary significantly depending on the context and the specific situation.

results.t: What age is considered old? - KSBY

results.p: May 4, 2024 — A recent German study asked people over the age of 40 that same question eight times over a period of 25 years, and it found “old” gets older as we age.

results.t: How old is too old to have kids in your opinion?
results.p: I think 45 is pushing it. Obviously for women it really is, but having a 20 year old at age 65 is no way to begin that stage of one's Life.

results.t: Employers believe this is the age you're too old to hire. ...
results.p: Jun 29, 2024 — Ageism at work is rea. A third of employers surveyed believe people who are 58 or older are too old to hire.

results.t: How Old Is Too Old to Work?
results.p: Mar 8, 2020 — Too often, Aronson argues, people over the age of sixty-five are viewed as a single group—one whose needs and desires and humanity are given short shrift.
